description: Manual and automated tests to run once main scene is available

tests.title: Monster AI Behavior
tests.description: Verify monster AI state machine works correctly with hunt, shoot, and flee behaviors

test_cases.name: No players - IDLE state
steps: Start server with no players connected
test_cases.expected: Monsters stay in IDLE state, no movement or shooting

test_cases.name: Single player - Chase behavior
steps: Move player within 250 units of a monster
test_cases.expected: Monster enters CHASE state, moves toward player at 120 units/sec

test_cases.name: Single player - Attack behavior
steps: Get player within 200 units of monster
test_cases.expected: Monster enters ATTACK state, stops moving, shoots every 0.75s with slower projectiles (300 speed)

test_cases.name: Player rush - Flee behavior
steps: Rush player within 100 units of monster
test_cases.expected: Monster enters FLEE state, moves away until 150+ units from player

test_cases.name: Multiple players - Target nearest
steps: Connect two players at different distances from monster
test_cases.expected: Monster targets nearest player, re-evaluates every 1 second

test_cases.name: Boundary behavior
steps: Lure monster to map edge during chase or flee
test_cases.expected: Monster does not get stuck at edges, steering avoids boundaries

test_cases.name: Player projectile hits monster
test_cases.expected: Monster takes 25 damage, dies after 2 hits (50 HP)

test_cases.name: Monster projectile hits player
test_cases.expected: Player takes 10 damage from monster projectile

test_cases.name: Performance - 20 monsters
steps: Wait for max monsters (20) to spawn
Connect player and observe tick rate
